es.unileon.rnag.cubiga

Class GeneticAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.unileon.rnag.cubiga.GeneticAlgorithm

  • public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Genetic algorithm that is used as an entry point for the library. Use its methods to get your algorithm running
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Javier de Pedro Lopez, Adrian Casimiro Alvarez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private FitnessOperator fitnessOperator
      The fitness operator of the algorithm.
      private Chromosome fittest
      The best chromosome obtained on all the process
      private int generationIndex
      Index that tells what is the current generation
      private GeneticStrategy geneticStrategy
      The strategy that will be used.
      private GeneticType geneticType
      The genetic type of the algorithm.
      private int numberOfGenerations
      Number of generations
      private Chromosome[] population
      The population chromosomes used on the algorithm
      private int populationSize
      The size of the population.
      private boolean runned
      True if the algorithm has been runned
      private StopOperator stopOperator
      Operator that checks if the algorithm must stop.

    • Field Detail

      • geneticStrategy

        private GeneticStrategy geneticStrategy
        The strategy that will be used. Includes selection, crossover and mutation

      • stopOperator

        private StopOperator stopOperator
        Operator that checks if the algorithm must stop. It is an external operator that must be implemented by the user.

      • fitnessOperator

        private FitnessOperator fitnessOperator
        The fitness operator of the algorithm. It is an external operator that must be implemented by the user.

      • populationSize

        private int populationSize
        The size of the population. It means the number of chromosomes on each generation.

      • population

        private Chromosome[] population
        The population chromosomes used on the algorithm

      • fittest

        private Chromosome fittest
        The best chromosome obtained on all the process

      • geneticType

        private GeneticType geneticType
        The genetic type of the algorithm. It tells to the algorithm which is the datatype

      • generationIndex

        private int generationIndex
        Index that tells what is the current generation

      • numberOfGenerations

        private int numberOfGenerations
        Number of generations

      • runned

        private boolean runned
        True if the algorithm has been runned

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticAlgorithm

        public GeneticAlgorithm(GeneticStrategy strategy,
                FitnessOperator fitness,
                StopOperator stop)
        Initializes the genetic algorithm
        Parameters:
        strategy - the crossover, mutation and selection that will be used
        fitness - an interface that has the fitness function
        stop - an interface that has the stop parameter

      • getCurrentGenerationNumber

        public int getCurrentGenerationNumber()
        Returns the generation number in which the algorthm is beeing executed. It is smaller than numberOfGenerations
        Returns:
        The number of the current generation

        public GeneticType getGeneticType()

        Returns:
        The generic type

      • setNumberOfGenerations

        public void setNumberOfGenerations(int numberOfGenerations)
        Establish the number of generations established
        Parameters:
        numberOfGenerations - The number of generations to establish. It must be greater or equal than 1

      • getNumberOfGenerations

        public int getNumberOfGenerations()
        Returns the number of generations that the algorithm has as initialized parameter
        Returns:
        The number of generations

      • getFittest

        public Chromosome getFittest()
        Returns the best chromosome in all generations.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(int populationSize,
              GeneticType type,
              int numberOfGenerations,
              double crossoverProbability,
              double mutationProbability)
        Initializes the genetic algorithm
        Parameters:
        populationSize - The size the population will have
        type - Data type of the genes and chromosomes inside the genetic algorithm
        numberOfGenerations - The number of generations that ill be executed
        crossoverProbability - The crossover probability
        mutationProbability - The mutation probability
